website_summaries.verdict: This durable leash is recognized for its high-quality construction and helpful accessories.
pros: Duo leash can adjust in size from 34 to 64 inches
Easy-to-grip handle made of a comfortable foam
Bungee tethers safer for dogs' necks
Reflective stitching offers enhanced nighttime visibility

customer_reviews.title: Best leash ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best leash ever! I have 2 dogs and have always struggled with walking both- leashes get tangled. This one has a rotating piece that allows a tangle free walk. The bungie feature is great- allows for one to explore even if the other doesn't. Comes with a water bowl which is a huge bonus! I use the clips at the top for waste bags. You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash. 2 big golden doodles
customer_reviews.text: Awesome leash. 2 big golden doodles. They criss cross, back and forth, back and forth. No problems there. The only thing bad is that if one dog goes behind you, you are the one that gets caught up in the tangle. You get tripped on one leash or end up in the middle of a wrap. You have to control the dogs, tell them to stop moving so you can untangle from them or put the whole thing on the ground to step out of the middle. If not it just looks like a three stooges routine. Someone with a video camera could win money.. hey I'm taking my camera next time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia O.

customer_reviews.title: I have two large dogs and this is the best leash ever
customer_reviews.text: I have two large dogs and this is the best leash ever! Good quality and sure does making walking them easier. I have two bloodhound and they pull hard, this leash took a lot of the tension away. Thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyandreese

customer_reviews.title: One of the best deals I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs, but Just two of them love to run and pull me while they are at it. One is an American bully and the other one is a Labrador. Before I used to walk or jog with them and their leashes always ended up like a big meses, since they tangled each other. But with this dual leash I can firmly walk, jog or even run with them without worrying about their leashes getting tangled again. Its super firm and soft in the handle that it doesnt hurt your hand, even while your pulling from it. I highly recommended it for any parent that has two or more dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described the easy clip on additional dog bowl is great for giving my pups water on the go and easy to bring along. I have been using this leash all summer with my mastiff boxer and my pitbull walking side by side and have and no issues. The bungy in the leash is a nice feature that helps absorb the shock when one of my dogs spots a stray animal it must bark at making for a much more enjoyable walk for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for large "pullers"
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 German Shorthair Pointers who are "pullers" by nature and am always looking for a way to provide a more pleasant walk for myself. This works pretty well. I use it with gentle leaders on each dog and as long as a squirrel or rabbit doesn't cross our path I can walk more naturally. For my younger more energetic guy, I hook a traditional leash on the lower D ring on his side and gained further control. I would say it is one of the best leashes I have ever purchased. Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: MarilynAmos

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy Dog Mom
customer_reviews.text: This leash is awesome! I have 2 large Akitas that are close to 100 pounds each and used to have to take them on separate walks. With this leash we can all go together! It is strong and durable and controls them if they try to pull.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyH

customer_reviews.title: Not for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 5 stars but I can't. They get you with the whole no tangle label, but if you have dogs that dont walk so great on the leash, they easily get tangled on themselves or even wrap around one another. I spent so much time untangling all 3 of us that I ended buying retractable leashes instead. If you have dogs that can walk nice on a leash, I recommend it. But if you dont have pups like that...dont get it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME,  DURABLE, EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I love that this leash is extra long with the ability to shorten when needed. It is extremely durable with my 100lb Rhodesian and 74lb Staffie & I have a separate bungie single version that I attach when I have my 3rd 59lb Rhodesian with me. The waste and metal attachments have not failed me ever after two years of twice a day walks with my beasts! This is my second purchase because I wanted to freshen the look as my original was faded.
customer_reviews.author: surfawahine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dual dog leash
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Dog approved. I have used this quite a few times with my dogs now and it works great! I also like the slight elasticity of the leashes. It's like a buffer to my dog who always likes to trail blaze. Instead of a slight jerk when she reaches the end of the leash, it's only a bit of resistance. We both like it as she doesn't choke and I don't stumble. I think I'm going to try to get another so I can try and walk my brother's dogs as well, but they aren't leashed trained... so that needs to come first :D
customer_reviews.author: QuarkieSparticle

customer_reviews.title: "BEST LEASH EVER"
customer_reviews.text: Our dog walker texted us the first time he used this: "Best leash ever" We really love this: no more tangles; the bungee is really helpful in compensating for pulls; it's well built and a great length. I liked it so much I bought a second one to give our dog walker as a gift, since he has two dogs of his own. The only adjustment I'd make is to add a wrist strap; the foam handle is pretty big and I'm paranoid about losing my grip on it without a backup in place. Easy enough problem to solve "aftermarket", but if were integrated this thing would be flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash! I have two dogs (50 and 75 lbs), both of whom walk well on leash. The tandem.part of the leash is long enough that it allows both dogs to sniff around at what they both want without getting pulled by the other. I want sure is like the elastic quality to part of the individual leads but I really do. It makes it less jarring if one does decide to pull. It's very sturdy. Only negative is that it's a little heavy. I would definitely only use this with dogs that are leash trained. 2 big dogs, not we'll leash trained, could pull the Walker right down...same can be said with any double leash though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have a 75 lbs Goldie that has a tendency to pull. Now dog-sitting for my daughter's 65 lbs loose leash walker. I was going crazy having to control two leashes with my dog pulling and getting the leashes tangled as he was criss crossing the other one. This leash solved the problem with no more tangled leashes and the extra bonus that my dog is now learning to pace the other one. This leash is sturdy for both dogs and the handle is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This works great if you have sturdy larger dogs especially. I’ve purchase prob 5 or 6 double leashes over the years. This one is very unique because of functionality and optional uses but one thing I won’t call it is lightweight! The thing itself is a lb. so my 35lb beagle is fine. Just glad the 8 lb chihuahua is a toughie. Qa
customer_reviews.author: Sharon_BB

customer_reviews.title: Not good for small dogs under 15lb
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice quality leash but it’s a little heavy for my dogs. They are on the smaller scale of recommended weight but there aren’t many options for smaller dogs with this style. this was too big and bulky. The leash dragged and therefore got tangled in their legs. It’s good for dogs that are pullers or walk ahead this way the leash doesn’t drag. I didn’t find the option to shorten the leash much help it would be too short for a pee walk. It would be good for an exercise walk. My dogs don’t like to exercise they just like to smell grass and do their business.
customer_reviews.author: christine marsicano

customer_reviews.title: Great leash.
customer_reviews.text: Love the padded handle and ability to shorten the leashes. I like this leash a lot but the little strap that holds up the leash slack when you shorten them broke already. The rest of the leash seems great. The only problem with the design in my opinion is if the dogs aren’t in front of you walking and they stop or go behind you, it’s hard to grab one leash and get the dog back in front of you. The best way I’ve found is to stop and step over that leash. 😳🤯
customer_reviews.author: Heather VonBerg

customer_reviews.title: If you have 2 dogs this particular style is a must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash! I just got my 2nd 1. The good thing about this leash compared to another 1 that I had to return was that this has a shorter handle and longer leads for each dog. The last 1 I got had a super long handle but the dogs had like a foot of leash. Super close to each other. This 1 is set up perfectly it has just the right amount of bounce and I totally love it
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a product like this or then able to walk both of my dogs at the same time. This is the 1st time they have been on walks on a dual leash. They were a little too excited when we started, but towards the end they settled down a little bit. The bungee is very sturdy, and takes a lot of shock out of either of them pulling on my arms, and keeps them under control. The swivel on the to attachments keeps them from getting tangled up at all.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best leash I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leash I have ever owned! I have two huskies that I walk daily that love to pull and try to chase bunnies. I needed something that would withstand pulling and not break but also dissipate some of the two airhead's power. This leash is very very sturdy and gives me that peace of mind that it will not break. Strong latches, swivel buckles to prevent tangling, and strong carbiner. Independent bungees on each side give each dog protection from injuries and also additional freedom from the other dog. Collapse able water bowl that attaches to leash is also included and very practical. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: nathan kintzer

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made. The folding water bowl is a great bonus. You can attach little bags to it for cleanup too. The only downfall is that one dog is leash trained the other was not and I got twisted like a pretzel. The people at the park had a good laugh watching me. LOL I would not recommend this leash for dogs that are not trained. If both dogs are trained then it is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Elastic broke day one
customer_reviews.text: I like this leash and had bought one before and wanted a second one as a backup - we’ve used the first one every day multiple times a day for weeks and had no problems. However, this second one we ordered the elastic broke and stretched out on side so no one dog can walk in front of the other and it leads to more tangles than two separate leashes would. We’ve had this second one less than one day and this already happened. Very disappointed in this product quality for this second one.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, used this with lab and labradoodle. Doodle likes to lead or be out in front and this is adjustable enough to allow miss bossypants to do that. We had a split lead but it really didn't allow that much separation of dogs..a problem when one wants to stop and poop..but this allows one to do business and not drag the other into the job at hand! Never tangled with this. It works great with big dogs..not sure how well it would work with small dogs. It is heavier. The handle is okay..maybe in time I will like it more than just a loop..but that is me...you can tell a lot of thought went into design!
customer_reviews.author: Alldogz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have two labs that are both just over two years old. It can be a challenge to walk them at the same time. This leash is awesome! Since it couples near the handle the dogs still have their own space and can walk on different sides. It really is no tangle, they can play and jump over each other and have not gotten wrapped up. The padded handle is great for me since my dogs can be rambunctious and pull. Great leash, I would definitely suggest this and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kristen aughtman

customer_reviews.title: It cushion you when the dog pulls, minimizes tangles while walking
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by explaining we have two canine daughters... Golden retrievers... they’re not pets, they are family members. After experiencing other double leashes, I purchased your dual dog leash thru Amazon and we are extremely happy with it. It’s sturdy and comfortable; just what you need for larger stronger babies. I do love the way it’s made, it minimizes the leash getting tangled. It has really made our walks more pleasurable.
customer_reviews.author: Rivca

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and I can’t wait to take my babies outside when the weather warms up! When I would walk my 2 small dogs on their retractable leashes the dogs without fail would go separate directions. They were always getting tangled on bushes, the carport, and chairs etc... It became real discouraging taking them outside until I did some research and found this leash. I can’t wait to use it when it gets warmer. I am very happy with the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Braddy

customer_reviews.title: Best for dogs who don't pull super hard.
customer_reviews.text: If I could suggest improvements, I would make the handle have a piece that can go around your wrist so your grip isn't the only thing holding the leash. My dogs pull HARD and I worry one day if they ever pull me over, I might lose grip on the handle. I like the bungee cord idea, although it is already starting to lose its elasticity as one side is longer than the other. Overall, I like this leash. If my dogs were easy walkers, I would love this leash. The bottom line is I would order this leash again. Update: 8/11/19 - One of the bungee cords broke and the other one is losing its elasticity.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter G.

customer_reviews.title: Great leash but may need to add stronger carabiner
customer_reviews.text: The handle is very comfortable. We had to replace the carabiner of the leash (part connecting the single leash to the dual leash)with a stronger carabiner we had. But since then everything is great! I do wish the single leash part (from handle to dual leash) was longer or adjustable. I feel like I’m walking on my dogs when they need to be on the shorter leash option due to traffic on our walks. But that’s an easy fix on my part. And has nothing to do with quality of this leash. Just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very energetic dogs that like to pull. A lab and a border collie/pit mix. This leash has been great for them and me. The bungee cord like properties of the leash really helps to reduce the jerk the dogs and myself feel if they decide to try to take off quickly. I no longer feel like my shoulder is going to be pulled out of the socket. Materials seem to be really good quality as well. The collapsible water bowl is also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with it. I have two black Labs, one who pulls and one who wants to stop and smell everything. This has really helped with my puller, it hasn't cured it completely, but definitely lessened it. Also his leash would get twisted as he would pull, turn around, pull, turn around. The dual leash has eliminated the twisting completely. Overall, walking the dogs is a much more pleasant experience for me, and I think for the dogs too.
customer_reviews.author: KCol

customer_reviews.title: Better than two seperate leashes!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my husky and boxer mix. At times, it makes me feel like I'm water skiing with the way the handle is made. My boxer mix decided to chew off the foam off the handle. I would love just to replace that foam piece.
customer_reviews.author: Margo L. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: A big hassle for something that should be easy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this leash, but I wanted to. The concept seems so great, but in real life, the dogs are constantly tangled. The handle is really hard, and you can't just wrap it around your wrist. One time at the clinic, one of my dogs got loose from he leash because that portion of the leash just came off of the clip! It is big and bulky when not fully extended. Great idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Has several problems in design
customer_reviews.text: The carabiner came undone twice in my walk with my 2 dogs. Thankfully, I was not on a major road. The bungee cord should be at the end of the leash rather than the beginning. As the dogs weaved in and out the leash became tangled and twice I had to untangle my dogs. The handle was great. That was it's most positive feature.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fit For Life Light Weight 64"
customer_reviews.text: Ok, great product but no way it is light weight for small animals! You will need harnesses with this leash system. Our two 80# kids have the Juxzh Truelove Soft Fronts and it's a perfect combo. Nice handle for us and forgiving bungees for them. See the CrazyRussian Hacker on YouTube for this system in action.
customer_reviews.author: GoodGuyWins

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is great for bigger dogs. I have a husky, pitbull, & boxer it makes it easier to take them on a walk myself. I really like the handle compared to a regular leash & use the included collapsible dog dowl for water a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn

customer_reviews.title: To much length between me and the dogs.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea but for me it didn't work. I like my dogs to walk closer to me when I'm walking them. I usually walk them around my neighborhood and people tend to pull out of their driveways or streets. I try to keep them closer so they don't get hit by any cars. These leashes are great but it gives them way to much room to walk ahead. I do like the idea but it doesn't work for me and my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: leash is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 dogs. My son likes this leash when walking the dogs (he walks the beagle and collie/pyrenees puppy mix so the height difference isn't an issue). I find the leash very heavy, I'd rather have a leash for each dog. We will keep it and my son will use it. I'm not sure how they would make the leash less heavy; I get the hardware that is needed. The leash does its job!
customer_reviews.author: CHoover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this a few times now and we love it! It’s very sturdy and well made. Our dogs are both around 30lbs, don’t think it would work well for small dogs. Full length is great for trail walking, and you can shorten it which we do for walking on our road where there are cars. Swivel keeps them from getting tangled. Can put doggie bags on the top clip. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is perfect for walking two of my dogs. I have three dogs and trying to manage three leashes always proved to be a challenge. Using this leash makes our walks so much more fun and tangle free. Two of my dogs are 10lbs and the third dog is 30lbs. I’ve used it in various combinations with all three of them and it works great every time. I’ve even hooked a third leash to the carabiner and that worked good as well. Would highly recommend the small size for smaller dogs as the hooks aren’t too heavy and the leashes are plenty long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Prosper

customer_reviews.title: This is the best leash we have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leash we have ever had! We have 2 Siberian huskies and walking them can be annoying. This leash is awesome because of the shock absorbing stuff they have on each leash. Plus, they don’t get tangled because the ring at the top of the leash revolves. It is now easier to walk both of them on this one leash than it is walking them with separate ones. Their walks are now enjoyable and they aren’t dragging me down the block anymore!
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirl123

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Had this for only a short time and fell a part , not very well made, needs much improvement
customer_reviews.author: James Guadgnola

customer_reviews.title: Very good leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy leash. I have two small beagles,18 lbs. each. At first I thought the hooks were kind of heavy for their size, but when they started pulling, I was grateful they were sturdy. I do think they are suited for medium to large size dogs. This dual leash is much better than using a single leash on each dog.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Miller

customer_reviews.title: To bulky.
customer_reviews.text: So u gave it an over all 2 * but4 stars for stretch and sturdiness. It's almost to bulky and heavy. I have 2 medium size dogs and have only used it a few times. Dont really like it. If you have bigger dogs that are more of the pulling type these would be nice, but with my quite dogs it's to much
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great leash, poor dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the leash and think it's a great sturdy leash to use when walking two dogs. I gave 3 stars because the water bowl was broken and cracked when we got it. I chose to spend the extra money on this leash because it included a collapsible bowl. Unfortunately it did not come as a workable item.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for big dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Love love my leash I have 2 German Shepherds and have no problem controlling them with this and have used it everyday since getting it. They never tangle and the reflective leash is great for night walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika LP

customer_reviews.title: We use it for small to medium dogs, but...
customer_reviews.text: As described. We got this for two small to medium sized dogs. The leads are fairly weighty, so for our small dog, we looped one side through one of the loops to make it a little shorter. The elastic does give as our 30 pounder has stretched it out some. But over all exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Leash is excellent. I am a Professional Dog Sitter who usually ...
customer_reviews.text: Leash is excellent. I am a Professional Dog Sitter who usually has 2-4 dogs at a time to walk. This leash comes in very handy. It is strong and has some elastic in the center so if your dog pulls at all you don't have to jerk the dog back.It has a big comfortable handle and a collapsible water dish attachment that comes in very handy. I highly recommend this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Royce E. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Not For Small Person
customer_reviews.text: Great product but as a small girl (5'0) in shoes and having a petite frame, the handle is too large and it's bulky. I walk two dogs - 50 and 60 lbs - and feel it would be better if it was about 9 inches shorter for city parks and spaces with people and other dogs. I had to fold it over several times to shorten and lead. If you add a third dog into the mix, it gets tangled. Well made, but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Wright at Home

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this! Very convenient for two huskies who love ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this! Very convenient for two huskies who love to pull. This in combination with the front leading harness works amazing. I changed the carabiner just in case ! But love it the handle is super soft no more tangled messes and red throbbing hands. love how its just one leash and even if I use both for one dog it severely prevents pulling. THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!! Photos to come later!
customer_reviews.author: JayThompson

customer_reviews.title: This leash is outstanding and will make your dog walking so easy
customer_reviews.text: This leash has made my life so much easier and it gives me much more control over my dogs behavior. My one dog no longer pulls so I do not have to spend time correcting her behavior. The length of the leash extensions for the dogs are the perfect length. My dogs can wander in different directions without pulling each other. Now that I have the perfect solution I will be walking my dogs every day.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Coates

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, wood definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking two medium to large size dogs who have different styles of walking behaviour. This was perfect for my roomies dogs as they like to go in different directions and at a different pace.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Jayne Macy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, well made and super functional
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL!! I got this yesterday and used it today and absolutely love it! Like previous reviewers I have two larger dogs (about 65 pounds each) and they constantly going different directions at different speeds - this is the first walk when I’ve not been constantly untangling them. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Very solid great product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice, solid, and sturdy. We are all getting used to the new system. My dogs have been brought up on pretty long, adjustable, retractable leashes which as you know are not always the safest. I needed to replace them and decided to try something new with them. Overall I feel like this is a safer option for my dogs, but it gives them less room to roam, which is just going to be an adjustment for us. I would highly recommend for any dual dog household. My dog walker absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but I ended up sending it back and ordering the lighter version. My husband didn't mind the weight of it, but I found it uncomfortable. Love the lighter weight version.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Works but gets wrapped around legs easily!!
customer_reviews.text: It's decent but be very careful because when you have 2 dogs attached they can easily get wrapped around your legs and make you fall. Especially large active dogs. It would be better if the actual leash that's attached to each dog was a little longer tho.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the ridiculous handle, this is by far the most well designed dual leash out there. Perfect for my two 30 lb pups. It’s a bit heavy with all the hardware but not too cumbersome. I never thought it could be so easy to walk two dogs at once. I hacked it by using a seam ripper to open the handle loop, removing the plastic grip, then sewing the loop back together so it resembles a normal leash. Only took about 10 minutes. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SPR88

customer_reviews.title: For dogs that walk in front
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. We have 2 German Shepherds that we walk one our left side together. I gave this to me friend who walks here 2 dogs in front of her. Perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: ableV

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for my two little dogs, both under 20 pounds each. It works pretty well for them, but they don't really walk very nicely, so one or the other is always pulling the other one around. It's a nice, sturdy leash that works well for us. Only downside was the handle, both my husband and I hated it, but we cut that off and now it's perfect. I'm not sure it would be good for two big dogs who aren't good walkers.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: No more dominance
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual leash. Makes walking my dogs so much easier. Firstly the weigh about 200 lbs together and juggling 2 leashes was a struggle with them tangling around me and each other constantly. The dual leash does not tangle. A+. Also the dominance factor of one always trying to take the lead is over They are neck in neck and with the harness they walk smoothly and I'm not being dragged through the walk. The only thing I would change is the handle. I like the leather bound handle of the single leash purchased from Pet for Life versus the heavy plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Great leash.... Keeps our dogs from getting tangled up. Has a few different options. Just wish it came with an additional carabiner, but I suppose I can find another one like it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, fun to use even with stubborn dogs
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with quality. Like the adjustments, padding on handle, quality build, bungie leash...all good for my husky who things she’s a sled dog when walking with my shepherd...can have them both connected and makes it much easier to handle 2 dogs! Or just 1 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walking is now a breeze
customer_reviews.text: have received my dog leash from your company and I have to say we LOVE it! I'm a female that typically walks my 55 pound pitbull and 35 pound Boston terrier / beagle by myself in a pretty busy neighborhood. Typically they pull alot and get tangled up easily. Day one with your leash our lives were easier! They don't pull as much and it gives me more control. Thankyou for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Renee

customer_reviews.title: Very good lease.
customer_reviews.text: Great lease, love the ability to shorten it. Unfortunately, the carabineer broke after just a couple of weeks. Once I replaced it with a more heavy duty option, lease is perfect for my 2 large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tami W

customer_reviews.title: Not for small puppies
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite sturdy and would be great for larger dogs. I ordered a small for my Westie pups and even when they are full grown it will be too heavy around their necks.
customer_reviews.author: 7Slots

customer_reviews.title: This leash is good quality, the dog's don't get tangled up like ...
customer_reviews.text: This leash is good quality, the dog's don't get tangled up like they would with 2 separate leashes. The only thing I didn't like is the part that is like a bungee cord - it makes it harder to control a dog that pulls on the leash. I also didn't care for the handle, it doesn't allow for a solid grip (if you have smaller hands). The "bonus" cup was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The bungie gives it a good cushion when they pull and the clip in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 2 huge huskies well, the carbine clip broke off the bowl first use but thats not why i got it. The bungie gives it a good cushion when they pull and the clip in the center to shorten the leash really helps when walking along the highway
customer_reviews.author: Lsmurf13

customer_reviews.title: Good leash
customer_reviews.text: My dogs still get tangled up, but at least I can walk them with one leash.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gerring

customer_reviews.title: Another win for Pet Fit For Life!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second item I've bought from you guys that is A++++. This is an AWESOME leash. I'm evaluating products to use in a new boarding/play day facility we're building and so far both (dog wand and this leash) are on our list!
customer_reviews.author: Three Bands

customer_reviews.title: walking the dogs is fun again!
customer_reviews.text: wow....it's the best thing since sliced bread......I can take both my dogs out for a walk without getting tangled up a half dozen times...all I can say is awesome and thank you ....pet fit and the amazon store are thee best....aliexpress and ebay no way ...amazon all the way the best....thanks for so many things to make my life easier and fun
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: but I'm hoping training will make that better. It's kind of awkward at first as an ...
customer_reviews.text: This leash is a game changer! I have 2 puppies, and they are still learning. This leash makes them pace with each other. One pulls quite I bit still, but I'm hoping training will make that better. It's kind of awkward at first as an owner to be successful with this leash simply because it's 2 dogs on one leash, but I'm getting the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and swivel/bungee feature is a plus.
customer_reviews.text: Really study dog leash. Still need to teach my dogs to not pull, but the swivel part of it makes it so both dogs don't twist the leash up
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: It's convenient and easy to walk both dogs now
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient and easy to walk both dogs now; however, I wish that it would extend a little more. I had to remove the portable bowl because it seemed to just get in the way. The concept is definitely a great one. As long as one or either of my dogs doesn't try to run behind me, I am OK.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great dual leash
customer_reviews.text: I've always have had two dogs at a time and this now makes walking easier. Right now I have a 8 year old lab and a 5 month old pointer puppy. The puppy doesn't walk in a straight line but with this leash we don't really get tangled. I still have mixed feelings with the bungee part of the leash but I'll get used to it. I also like that I can make the leash shorter. Great bonus of the travel bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Siara Glenny

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this double leash because the last one I bought fell apart. I have 2 very large dogs and this leash works perfect! It’s very strong and sturdy. I don’t feel like this one will every come apart and break. The free water bowl is a bonus so I can give my dogs a drink during long walks on the towpath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect double leash for two dogs. I had no idea this leash will make the walking a breeze. We are very pleased with the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I can finally walk both of my dogs together!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this leash! I've tried to take our two dogs out together in the past, and it was always SUCH a headache with the leashes getting tangled. Our South African Mastiff is a puller, and I feel like the bungee makes her pull less... she realizes she's at the end of the leash without a harsh tug. I did purchase a strong carabiner to replace the one that it came with after reading a couple of other reviews saying it wasn't the sturdiest. Both dogs love going for walks together now and they are happy to walk side by side... best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Benz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m just mad I didn’t get this sooner!! It’s amazing for two dogs that are about the same size! I use to struggle on walks. Now it’s easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ky

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have if you have multiple dogs. I did not expect to love it as much as I do! I love that there is a short length and long length option making it very versatile. This is perfect for walking on trails or to hook them up while hanging out at a campsite/unfenced area. They can both relax on the leash and I dont have to constantly untangle them. This leash is high quality, durable, and allows easy control when walking my 60 and 80 lb babies. I HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have a full grown Australian Shepherd and a 13 week old Bloodhound puppy. This leash allows them to walk together at slightly different paces and stop and smell separately without any difficulty at all. The best thing about it is the bungee which eliminates the pulling. If the dog pulls, the bungee bounces them back a bit to adjust their pace.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I ever bought for my 2 dogs. I recently adopted a 2nd and bought this leash so I didn’t have to hold 2. One pills more than the other so I put her leash on the shorter clip and the other on the longer. I love the bungee cord part so my dogs are kind of “warned” before they go too far. Super durable, no problems. Def will boy again if I ever lose this one. One dog is 20lb my other is 30lb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can enjoy my walks.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my two Cavalier King Charles. Simplified and makes walking less stressful. Like it better as I was always doing a dance to untangle with my two retractable leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Finley

customer_reviews.title: Makes walking my dogs SO MUCH easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I struggled with trying to walk my two dogs together - I would wind up wound up & they would get tangled, too! Now it's so easy! And I have a free hand as well!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: The handle is very comfortable and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.text: This makes walking two big dogs pure joy! It is sturdy and the dogs don’t get tangled up in it. There is enough leash for each dog to do his own thing!
customer_reviews.author: N. Hofus

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my two little dogs! I ordered the small leash and it's perfect for my two 15 pounders. I just finished using the leash for first time today and walking them was a breeze! If you are looking to walk your two dogs easier you can't go wrong with this leash. NO tangles and the collapsible bowl is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would be good for small or large dogs
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to work so bad, it would have except my dogs are very small and it was too strong/heavy for them. Worth trying for medium sized and larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice features for a dual leash.
customer_reviews.text: Great leash! Makes it easy to walk my two dogs at the same time. The extra d-clips come in handy when I need to shorten the leads for road walking. The bungies are great to slow them down without a huge jerk.
customer_reviews.author: Melisland

customer_reviews.title: I love my two dog leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a thoughtfully designed, heavy duty leash for two dogs. I've been using it about a week now and I can pack away all the other leashes I bought to find a solution for my two large, pulling labs who weigh a combined total of 200 lbs. I live the short and long length options, allowing me to let them roam in my neighborhood and to keep them close when I'm walking on the sidewalk of a busy road.
customer_reviews.author: Hikerkm

customer_reviews.title: Leash
customer_reviews.text: I am really hopeful for this leash. I had one before for my other dogs, so once my smaller puppy can handle the weight of it I will co.e back on and edit my review.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited about this leash! We have a 45lb dog and a 90lb dog that I walked for the first time tonight with this leash and it was so nice! I was drawn to this leash because I can walk two dogs with one leash but they still have room to do their own thing. The handle makes it easy to hold on to them, even when they pull. I wasn’t sure how my dogs would handle being on one leash, but they did t even seem to notice. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: The Best for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large wiemaraners pulling on this leash and its holding up and working like a charm, love it...
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have to small/medium dogs and this is great for taking them to the beach together! No more dreading the juggling of two leashes! The leashes are nice and thick and well-made. The handle has lots of options on how to hold and the bingos cord action makes it all so much more comfortable for owners with dogs who pull.
customer_reviews.author: Jennfoo

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great leash system!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great leash! Just took my girls for a walk using it and have nothing but good things to say. Plenty of leash for each of them to move around without being on top of each other. NO TANGLED LEASHES! YAY! Very enjoyable walk with my two hound mix dogs who love to keep their noses to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for large active dogs
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this leash is awesome. I have a 70# Shepherd and a 30# Husky pup that both love to pull and run around each other. No tangles with this leash. Plus the bunjee in the leash makes it so much easier on my arm and the dogs necks when they want to run opposite directions. The new carabineer must be a huge improvement cause this thing is extremely strong and kinda heavy. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 2 dog leash
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how I could control two dogs but it was perfect! Love the bungee tension. Dogs have plenty of room and I love adjusting for length.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: We have an 8 year old Golden Retriever and a 1 year Shepherd/Lab Mix. Trying to walk both on different leashes was a challenge when walking them. We got this leash in this week and walking the dogs is SO much easier. The dogs did get wrapped around me but with more training, this will work out just fine. Great company and awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: lfitch

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Very durable and good length for walking tour dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice leash
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased the small dog version, I wish that the elastic was also geared to a small dog. It may as well not even be there as my two eight pound poms can't stretch it at all. Otherwise, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Glass

customer_reviews.title: I camp a lot and looked for a very long time for a good bungee style double leash with a comfortable handle
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 min pin mixes that are sisters one weighs 18lbs and the other is 22 lbs. I camp a lot and looked for a very long time for a good bungee style double leash with a comfortable handle. This leash has gone above and beyond my expectations! They do not ever get tangled, it is excellent quality, very comfortable to use, and an excellent price. If your looking for a double leash, this is the one to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Good for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: This leash is great. Easy to use. I have 2 large dogs, both over 90 lbs and there's no problem when walking them. It's also easy to shorten when needled
customer_reviews.author: Stan Seyler

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! How have I owned multiple dogs for over 20 years and never owned one of these? I absolutely love this leash! My dogs all do great walking together now. I was worried about the handle but it is so comfortable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gibby Gibstone

customer_reviews.title: Tough and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have used this leash every day with my small dogs. I have also used it in occasion with two big dogs and it’s just as good. This leash has taken a beating and still looks and works great. It’s tough. I love it
customer_reviews.author: M. East

product_meta.title: Pet Fit For Life Light Weight 64" Premium Dual Dog Leash with Comfortable Soft Grip Foam Rubber Handle and Integrated Shock Absorbing Bungee + Bonus Water Bowl
product_meta.description:
Size:LargePET FIT FOR LIFE 64" PREMIUM COVERTIBLE DUAL DOG LEASH 

 Looking for a quality leash? You can stop right here! This will be the last leash you will ever buy!! 

 Product Features: 

 100% Quality - Made from super strong nylon. All stress points and loops are triple reinforced. Premium stainless steel rings, swivels and connectors. This leash will take a beating day after day and hold up under the most extreme conditions. Cleans up easily with mild soap and water. 
With the soft grip handle the leash measures 64" but is easily convertible to 34" for times when more control is necessary.
Soft Rubber Grip - Exclusive, comfortable, soft foam rubber handle. 
Integrated Bungee - The tethers are integrated with super flexible, shock absorbing, bungee enclosed in the nylon. This feature is unique to these leashes and gives your dogs a gentle reminder that they are reaching the end of their rope, so to speak. This can be helpful in training your dog’s when it's time to stop pulling. 
No Tangles - The interface between the upper and lower tethers is stainless steel, double ringed swivel to help keep the lower tethers separate and prevent tangles. 
Weather Resistant - Stands up to the most extreme weather and with minimal care will last a lifetime. 


 At Pet Fit For Life we stand behind our products with a 100% customer satisfaction, money back guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, contact us and we will replace or refund no questions asked. Our success is measured by your satisfaction!!! 

 Click *Add To Cart* above...and get your Pet Fit For Life Dual Purpose Premium Dog Leash today.
feature_bullets: ★ NEW PET FIT FOR LIFE PREMIUM 64" CONVERTIBLE DUAL DOG LEASH - Now you can walk both your dogs with one leash. Made with quality materials and built to last. Easily converts from 64" (when you want to give your dogs some room to sniff around) to 34" (for tight spaces or when you need more control) making this the most versatile dual dog leash available anywhere. Click on image #3 on the left. You'll never have to buy another leash!!

★ SOFT GRIP FOAM RUBBER HANDLE - 12" long, this awesome handle provides a comfortable grip for maximum control of your dogs or puppies. Triple reinforced loop and stress points and 1/4 stainless steel connector ring give you confidence while exercising your dogs.

★ INTEGRATED BUNGEE TETHERS – Proven to be safer for your dog’s neck (not to mention better for your arm!), our integrated short bungee tethers give your dogs a gentle reminder that they are getting to the end of leash without choking them. This innovative feature can also assist in training your dogs.

★ SAFE FOR YOU AND YOUR DOG - Swivel interface between handle, tether and leash make tangles virtually impossible. Made from safe non-toxic material so the occasional chewing will not be a problem. Reflective stitching throughout offers enhanced night time visibility.

★ PET FIT FOR LIFE - The most trusted name in pet supplies on Amazon. We back our products with a 100% customer satisfaction money back guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we will replace or refund no questions asked. We welcome all feedback about our products and address any issues immediately. That's our promise to you, our valued customer.
